metadata.title: CVE-2023-52600 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:jfs: fix uaf in jfs_evict_inodeWhen the execution of diMount(ipimap) fails, the object ipimap that hasbeenreleased may be accessed in diFreeSpecial(). Asynchronous ipimap releaseoccurswhen rcu_core() calls jfs_free_node().Therefore, when diMount(ipimap) fails, sbi->ipimap should not beinitialized asipimap.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
